divs: sighting detailsi was at darien lake saturday 9\15 attending the kiss and motley crue concert. on the way back from the bathroom with two of my friends i looked up and saw two red orbs . they were noticeably larger than the stars. at first the upper orb was still while the lower orb slowly ascended. after a few minutes the upper orb started to ascend as well until it dissapeared. within minutes the lower orb also ascended until it dissapeared. it looked like they both flew right out of the atmosphere. i pointed the it out to my buddies and they watched as well. halfway through the sighting we met up with our group in total seven of us witnessed this.dthroughout the sighting the orbs slowly pulsated. we ere all calm and did not feel at all threatened by what wesaw.one of my friends served in the navy and work o n all types of aircraft. none of us had any idea whetthe objects could be or where they came from.-
Summary: two red orbs 1 stationary 1 moving both eventually ascended until what appeared like they left the atmosphere
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There was one other sighting in Buffalo on or around September 15th 2012
